story_27_59000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Our plan to sabotage the PML should be kicking off
any minute now, huh.
story_27_59000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah. Every Team Break member on Pasio should
be receiving instructions as we speak.
story_27_59000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We’re talking tons of operatives here—enough
of us to blow our last assault on the arena out
of the water.
story_27_59000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Good! Lear mighta slipped away from us, but
that won’t matter once the plan’s set in motion.
story_27_59000/2401_1001_0500_10: The PML’s as good as gone!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_0800_10: Well, well! Look who I found!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Buffoons like you should consider it a privilege to
be chased down by me.
story_27_59000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You see, I never got to thank you properly for
taking care of me! I figured now might be a
good time.
story_27_59000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Hah! Did you hit your head, man? You’d have to
be pretty dumb to come right back to the place
you just escaped from!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_1300_10:
The prince thinks he’s funny. Let’s see if he’s still
smiling when we’re through with him!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Everybody, move in! We’re gonna capture him
again, just like we did last time!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_1600_10: Rachel, Sawyer, lend me a hand!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_1900_10: Tch! I see you brought some friends this time!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Doesn’t matter, though! Last time you fought with
three Pokémon, too, and we still crushed you!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_2300_10: Rachel! You and Umbreon cover our backs!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Sawyer! Have Honchkrow keep pace with
Krookodile as we move in! Got it?
story_27_59000/2401_1001_2600_10: Ready when you are, young master!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Krookodile, you’re our striker! Get ready to punch
through this mob!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_2800_10: We can do this as a team! I believe in us!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Hah! Team or no team, there’s no way you can
defeat us!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_3000_10: Yeah! We outnumber you by like a million!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_3100_10:
C’mon, y’all! Time to put the puny prince in
his place!
story_27_59000/2401_1001_3200_10: Get ready to lose, Team Break!
